entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
